short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies email adress of who the email was sent to

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension copies the email adress of whoever you once sent an email to when you are on the sent page. It makes copying email adress of that receiver faster when you need to send multiple emails to the same address. 

Just click blue icon beside the gmail support icon to copy the email.
